actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a refundable credit against income tax for the purchase of computer software that filters child pornography and material that is violent, obscene, or harmful to minors.
short_title: Internet Child Safety Tax Credit Act

summary.text: Internet Child Safety Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a credit of up to $100 for the purchase of computer software that filters or blocks, when accessing the Internet, child pornography, material harmful to minors, and other violent or obscene material.

titles.title: Internet Child Safety Tax Credit Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a refundable credit against income tax for the purchase of computer software that filters child pornography and material that is violent, obscene, or harmful to minors.
